content: Our Father Who art in heaven /Hallowed be Thy name / Thy kingdom come / Thy will be done on earth / as it is in       heaven. Give us this day our daily bread / and forgive us our debts and sins / as we have forgiven our debtors. Lead us not into temptation / but deliver us from the evil one. For thine is the kingdom / the power and the glory / forever and ever. Amen.
